subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Jeffrey Earnhardt, 19, is racing in the lower-level Camping World East regional series and is being groomed as the fourth generation of his family to make it in Nascar.
snippet: Jeffrey Earnhardt, 19, is racing in the lower-level Camping World East regional series and is being groomed as the fourth generation of his family to make it in Nascar.
